inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: "Areas where the production of goods is directly based on local natural resources. The primary sector transforms natural resources into primary products. Most products from this sector are either raw materials for other industries (e.g. food, metal, wood industry), or are directly consumed by end-users. Major subsectors of primary production are agriculture, animal husbandry, agribusiness, fishing, forestry and mining and quarrying activities.Areas where the manufacturing industries aggregate, package, purify or process the primary products close to the primary producers are to be included, especially if the raw material is unsuitable for sale or difficult to transport long distances. "
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: primary production

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Production of crop (plants, fungi, etc.) and animal products for food, for sale, own consumption or industrial purposes. It includes plants for biofuels and growing of crops in open fields as well as in greenhouses. Also set-aside fallow land in the crop rotation belongs to this class. The preparation of products for the primary markets is included, field construction (e.g. agricultural land terracing, drainage, preparing rice paddies etc.) as well as landscape care and maintenance.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: agriculture

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Arable land, permanent crops and grasslands in agricultural use (both sown and natural grassland). The products can be used for human or animal feed or bio-energy production.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: commercial agricultural production

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Farm dwellings, animal husbandry infrastructure (animal dwellings and processing infrastructure linked to farms), manure storage and other farming infrastructure (e.g. buildings linked to plant handling and processing in farms).
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: farming infrastructure

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Production of plants or animals for own consumption (kitchen gardens, private animal sheds etc.)
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: agricultural production for own consumption

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Production of round wood and other wood based primary products. Besides the production of timber, forestry activities result in products that undergo little processing, such as firewood, charcoal and round wood used in an unprocessed form (e.g. pit-props, pulpwood etc.). Forest tree nurseries, storage and transport areas linked to logging trees and woody plants for bio fuels are also included. These activities can be carried out in natural or planted forests.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: forestry

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Forestry areas where the rotation period of a tree generation is 50 years or less, after which the forest is regenerated naturally or artificially with planting or seeding. Tree plantations (pulp-wood production) and wood used for biomass production also belong to this class.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: forestry based on short rotation

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Forestry areas where the rotation period of a tree generation is over 50 years after which the forest is regenerated naturally or artificiallywi th planting or seeding.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: forestry based on intermediate or long rotation

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Forestry areas where forest management and regeneration is based on continuous growing of trees.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: forestry based on continuous cover

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Mining and quarrying in the form ofï¿½the extraction of minerals and materials occurring naturally as solids (coal, ores, gravel, sand, salt), liquids (petroleum), gases (natural gas) or biomass (peat). Extraction can be achieved by different methods such as underground or surface mining or extraction, well operation etc.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: mining and quarrying

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Mining and extraction of coal, lignite, peat, petroleum, natural gas, uranium and thorium.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: mining of energy producing materials

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Mining of iron and other non-ferrous metal ores (except uranium and thorium).
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: mining of metal ores

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Quarrying of stone, sand, clay, chemical, fertilizer minerals, the production of salt and other mining and quarrying.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: other mining and quarrying

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Professional fishing and aquaculture.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: aquaculture and fishing

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Fish hatcheries and managed grow-out sites.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: aquaculture

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Water areas used for professional fishing.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: professional fishing

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Professional hunting, gathering of wild growing non-wood forestry products, husbandry of migratory animals and any other primary production not included in the values 1_1_Agriculture, 1_2_Forestry, 1_3_MiningAndQuarrying, 1_4_AquacultureAndFishing or any of their narrower values.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: other primary production

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Professional hunting. The areas can be fenced or open.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: hunting

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Keeping and feeding migratory animals such as reindeer and deer.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: management of migratory animals

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Picking up natural non wood based products such as non-cultivated berries, mosses, lichen etc. for commercial purposes.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: picking of natural products

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: "Industrial and manufacturing activities which take the output of the primary sector and manufacture finished goods and intermediate products for other business. It also includes the storage and transport areas linked directly to manufacturing activities.The branches of industries covered by this class are the processing of: food, textile, leather, wood and wood product, pulp, paper, publishing, printing, recording, petroleum and other fuels, chemicals, chemical products, man-made fibers, rubber and plastic products, non metallic mineral products, basic metals and metal products, fabricated metal product, machinery and equipment, electrical and optical equipment, transport equipment and furniture."
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: secondary production

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Industrial activities transforming the output primary sector into manufactured raw products.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: raw industry

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Preparation and spinning of textile fibres, sewing threads, textile weaving, tanning and dressing of leather.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: manufacturing of textile products

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Sawmilling and planning of wood, manufacturing of veneer sheets, plywood, laming boards, fibre boards, carpentry and joinery, cork, straw and plaiting products.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: manufacturing of wood and wood based products

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Manufacturing of pulp, paper, paperboard, paper based sanitary goods, wallpapers
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: manufacturing of pulp paper and paper products

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Manufacturing of coke, refined petroleum and processing of nuclear fuel.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: manufacturing of coke refined petroleum products and nuclear fuel

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Manufacturing of basic chemicals, agro-chemicals, paints, pharmaceuticals, soap, detergents, glues, other chemical products and man-made fibers
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: manufacturing of chemicals chemical products man made fibers

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Manufacturing, processing and casting of iron, steel and basic precious and non-ferrous metals. It also includes the manufacturing of metal products.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: manufacturing of basic metals and fabricated metals

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Manufacturing of glass, bricks, ceramics, concrete, cement, lime, plaster, cutting and shaping of stone and other non-metallic mineral products.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: manufacturing of non metallic mineral products

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Manufacturing of tyres, tubes, plastic packing goods and other rubber and plastic products.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: manufacturing of rubber plastic products

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Production of raw materials not included in any other of the narrower values of 2_1_RawIndustry.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: manufacturing of other raw materials

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Activities transforming raw manufactured products into heavy manufactured products.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: heavy end product industry

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Manufacturing of production, agricultural, forestry and other machinery (excluding aircrafts and vehicles), manufacturing of weapons, ammunition and domestic appliances.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: manufacturing of machinery

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Manufacturing of motor vehicles, aircrafts, space crafts, ships, boats, railway and tramway equipment, motorcycles, bicycles and other transport equipment.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: manufacturing of vehicles and transport equipment

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: "Production of other heavy end products not included in any other of the narrower values of 2_2_HeavyEndProductIndustry."
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: manufacturing of other heavy end products

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Activities transforming raw manufactured products into light manufactured products
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: light end product industry

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Manufacturing of meat, fish, fruit and vegetables, oils and fats or derived products, dairy products, grain mill and starch products, prepared animal feeds, other food products, beverages and tobacco products.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: manufacturing of food beverages and tobacco products

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Manufacturing of wearing apparel, leather clothes, dressing, accessories, dyeing of fur and manufacturing of fur products, luggage, bags, saddles and footwear.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: manufacturing of clothes and leather

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Publishing and printing of books, newspapers, journals and the publishing and reproduction of sound recordings.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: publishing and printing

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Manufacturing of office machinery, computers, motors, generators, electricity distribution and control apparatus, wires and cables, accumulators, batteries, lamps, radios, TVs, phones, electronic valves and tubes, medical, precision and optical instruments, watches and other electrical and optical equipment.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: manufacturing of electrical and optical equipment

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Manufacturing of furniture, jewellery, musical instruments, sports goods, games, toys and other miscellaneous products.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: manufacturing of other light end products

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Production of energy.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: energy production

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Nuclear power plants.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: nuclear based energy production

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Power plants using fossil fuels (coal, oil, natural gas, peat and other fossil fuels).
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: fossil fuel based energy production

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Combustion power plants using biomass based fuels (wood and other plant based solid and liquid fuels, biogas and other biofuels).
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: biomass based energy production

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Hydro-, solar, wind, thermal (aero, geo and hydro), tidal, wave etc. energy and other renewable energy (except biomass energy, which is covered by the value 2_4_3_BiomassBasedEnergyProduction).
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: renewable energy production

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Production of other industrial products not included in any other of the narrower values of 2_SecondaryProduction.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: other industry

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Services that are products for other businesses and consumers both private and public services. It encompasses whole sale and retail trade, repair services, hotels and restaurants, financial services,ï¿½real estate, business services, rental services, public administration, defence and social security, education, health and social work and other community, social and personal services.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: tertiary production

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Provision of commercial servies
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: commercial services

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: "Wholesale and retail sale of motor vehicles, fuel, agricultural raw materials, live animals, ores, metals, chemicals, timber , machinery, ships, furniture, household goods, textiles, food, beverages, tobacco products,pharmaceutical products, second hand goods, other products, waste and scrap. This class also includes the repair of vehicles, personal and household goods."
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: wholesale and retail trade and repair of vehicles and personal and household goods

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Provision of real estate and renting services.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: real estate services

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Hotel, holiday village, camping site, restaurant, bar and canteen services.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: accommodation and food services

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Other commercial services not included in any other of the narrower values of 3_1_CommercialServices, such as beauty and wellbeing services.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: other commercial services

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Provision of financial, professional or information services.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: financial professional and information services

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Areas used for the provision of banking, credit, insurance, and other financial services.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: financial and insurance services

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: IT consulting, data processing, research and development, legal, accountancy, business management, architectural, engineering, advertising, testing, investigation, consulting, and other professional services.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: professional technical and scientific services

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Publishing, sound recording, TV-programme, motion picture, radio broadcasting, post and telecommunication, computer and data processing services.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: information and communication services

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Travel agency, rental, cleaning, security and other administrative and support services.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: administrative and support services

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: "Other financial, professional and information services not included in any other of the narrower values of 3_2_FinancialProfessionalAndInformationServices."
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: other financial professional and information services

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Provision of services for the community.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: community services

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Provision of generic administrative, defence, justice, public security, fire and compulsory social security services.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: public administration defense and social security services

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Provision of primary, secondary, higher, adult and other educational services.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: educational services

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Provision of human and animal health and social work services.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: health and social services

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Provision of religious services.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: religious services

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Other community services (e.g. cemeteries).
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: other community services

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Provision of cultural, entertainment or recreational services
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: cultural entertainment and recreational services

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Provision of artistic, library, museum, zoos, botanical gardens, historical sites and other cultural services.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: cultural services

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Amusement parks, , theme parks, betting and gambling activities and other entertainment services.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: entertainment services

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Sports infrastructure, such as stadiums, sports halls, swimming pools, fitness facilities, ski resorts, golf courses and other sports infrastructure.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: sports infrastructure

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Open air recreational areas, e.g. urban parks, playgrounds, national parks, and natural areas used for recreational purposes (e.g. forests, heathland, moors, mountains, agricultural areas, ponds, lakes, rivers).
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: open air recreational areas

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Other recreational services not included in any of the other narrower values of 3_4_CulturalEntertainmentAndRecreationalServices.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: other recreational services

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Provision of other services not included in any of the other narrower values of 3_TertiaryProduction.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: other services

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Basic infrastructure and networks of the society. All the other sectors are using the infrastructure and networks to produce the goods and services and they are aslo vital for residential areas.ï¿½ It includes land used for water supply, collection, treatment and recycling of sewage and waste,ï¿½transport, networks, storage and communication.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: transport networks logistics and utilities

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Infrastructure related to transport
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: transport networks

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Areas used for road transport, e.g. roads, parking areas, service stations
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: road transport

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Areas used for rail transport, e.g. rails, railway stations and yards etc.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: railway transport

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Areas used for air transport, e.g. airports and related services.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: air transport

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Areas used for water transport, e.g. ports, rivers, docks and related services.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: water transport

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Areas used for other transport not included in any of the other narrower values of 4_1_TransportNetworks.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: other transport network

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Areas used for separate (not linked directly to industries) storage services and logistical services.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: logistical and storage services

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Infrastructure related to facilities.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: utilities

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Areas used distribution of electricity, gas and thermal energy. This class includes the pipelines used for transporting oil and gas.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: electricity gas and thermal power distribution services

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Areas used for the extraction, collection, purification storage and distribution of water and collection and treatment of sewage (including the pipelines).
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: water and sewage infrastructure

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Areas used for the collection, treatment and recycling of waste (dumpsites, waste incineration, composting, hazardous waste treatment and recycling facilities).
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: waste treatment

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Areas used for other utilities not included in any of the other narrower values of 4_3_Utilities.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: other utilities

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Areas used dominantly for housing of people. The forms of housing vary significantly between, and through, residential areas. These areas include single family housing, multi-family residential, or mobile homes in cities, towns and rural districts if they are not linked to primary production. It permits high density land use and low density uses. This class also includes residential areas mixed with other non-conflicting uses and other residential areas (e.g. temporarily used areas).
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: residential use

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Residential areas dominated by detached houses surrounded by gardens and/or yards, a mix of single houses, semi-detached houses, terraced houses, town houses, row houses and blocks of flats used as permanent residence.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: permanent residential use

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Residential areas mixed with other non-conflicting uses (e.g. various services, light industries etc.).
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: residential use with other compatible uses

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Areas domantly used for temporary dwellings (camps of migrant people), holiday residences (summer cottages), etc.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: other residential use

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Areas not included in the values 1_PrimaryProduction, 2_SecondaryProduction, 3_TertiaryProduction, 4_TransportNetworksLogisticsAndUtilities, 5_ResidentialUse or any of their narrower values, or areas under construction.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: other uses

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Areas under construction. This class should be used only for existing land use and not for planned land use.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: transitional areas

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Abandoned agricultural, residential and industrial, transport and basic infrastructure areas. The area belongs to the abandoned class if it isï¿½not in use and can no longer be used for the original purpose without major reparation or renovation work.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: abandoned areas

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Areas which are in natural state and not in other economic use.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: natural areas not in other economic use

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Areas which are in natural state, e.g. woodland, shrubland, grassland, wetland, bare land, which are not in any other socio-economic use. This includes the areas with a planning status ï¿½natural areaï¿½. Protected areas can belong to this class or, if other uses are present, also to other classes. Protected areas are always tagged with a supplementary regulation status ï¿½protected areaï¿½.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: land areas not in other economic use

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Water areas which are not in other any socio-economic use (e.g. lakes, rivers, and permanent snow or ice covered areas).
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: water areas not in other economic use

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Areas where any use is allowed in the Planned land use (PLU).
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: areas where any use allowed

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Areas where no use is specified in the Planned land use (PLU), e.g. areas outside the scope of the plan.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: areas without any specified planned use

inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Areas where the land use is unknown.
inscl:CodeDefinition.gml:name: not known use
